code: import React from'react';import StatusBadge from'./StatusBadge';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TicketCard=_ref=>{let{ticket,onClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:onClick,className:"bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm hover:bg-white hover:shadow-xl rounded-2xl p-6 border border-gray-100 hover:border-blue-200 cursor-pointer transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1 group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-start justify-between mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-2 mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatusBadge,{status:ticket.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs bg-gray-100 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-gray-600",children:ticket.priority.toUpperCase()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 px-2 py-1 rounded-full",children:ticket.category})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-bold text-xl text-gray-900 mb-2 leading-tight group-hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors",children:ticket.title})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 leading-relaxed line-clamp-2 mb-4",children:ticket.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between text-xs text-gray-500",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Created ",new Date(ticket.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Last updated ",new Date(ticket.updatedAt).toLocaleDateString()]})]})]});};export default TicketCard;
